alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Marion; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 1:32PM CST until January 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero late tonight through Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero Friday Night through Saturday Morning. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM Friday to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
